sentences.sContent: So far, however, we have said nothing about how to deploy it.
sentences.sContent_eng: So far, however, we have said nothing about how to deploy it.
sentences.sCn: 到现在，我们还没说任何如何部署的内容。

sentences.sContent: You can then customize and deploy these artifacts in the usual way.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can then customize and deploy these artifacts in the usual way.
sentences.sCn: 然后，您可以以常规的方式定制和部署这些工件。

sentences.sContent: Now that you have seen the anatomy of each component, you can deploy them.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now that you have seen the anatomy of each component, you can deploy them.
sentences.sCn: 您已经了解了对每个组件的剖析，现在可以部署它们了。
